entries.title: Why is Ovidio Guzmán one of Mexico’s most wanted men?
entries.description: Mexican security forces on Thursday arrested cartel leader Ovidio Guzmán, son of incarcerated kingpin Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzmán, the country’s defense minister

entries.title: Mexican airline Aeromexico says a plane was hit by gunfire, no reported injuries
entries.description: Mexican airline Aeromexico said a plane in Culiacán, Sinaloa was hit by gunfire. Authorities had arrested cartel leader Ovidio Guzmán, son of "El Chapo" Guzmán.

entries.title: ‘They should be judged by their actions’: Kyiv residents mistrustful of Russian cease-fire
entries.description: In a move initially proposed by the head of the Russian Orthodox Church, President Putin has ordered his forces to observe a 36-hour cease-fire in Ukraine to coincide with Orthodox Christmas.

entries.title: U.K. saw hottest-ever year in 2022 as Europe’s climate warms
entries.description: Britain had its warmest year on record in 2022, official figures showed Thursday, the latest evidence that climate change is transforming Europe’s weather.

entries.title: Putin calls on Kyiv to observe 36-hour cease-fire in Ukraine for Russian Orthodox Christmas
entries.description: President Vladimir Putin has instructed his military to observe a cease-fire in Ukraine for 36 hours to mark Russian Orthodox Christmas.

entries.title: Thousands seeking asylum crowd Mexico refugee offices amid fears of a U.S. policy change
entries.description: Thousands of migrants seeking asylum have flocked Mexico government offices since the U.S. said it would keep restrictions to quickly expel border crossers.

entries.title: Putin ally Prigozhin grants freedom to Russian convicts who fought in Ukraine
entries.description: Yevgeny Prigozhin, founder of the Wagner Group, Russia’s most powerful mercenary group, bade farewell to former convicts who had served out their contracts in Ukraine rather than in Russian prisons.

entries.title: Putin ally Prigozhin grants freedom to first Russian convicts who fought in Ukraine
entries.description: Wagner founder Yevgeny Prigozhin bid farewell on Thursday to former Russian convicts who had served out their contracts fighting in Ukraine.

entries.title: U.S. reinstates negative Covid tests for travelers from China
entries.description: The U.S. has reinstated required Covid-19 testing for travelers arriving from China, Hong Kong and Macau as China prepares to relax its rules on international travel for the first time since the pandemic began. NBC News’ Marissa Parra has the details.

entries.title: Pope Francis presides over historic funeral Mass for Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI
entries.description: Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI was laid to rest in a historic and unprecedented funeral Mass presided over by Pope Francis at the Vatican following his death at the age of 95. NBC News’ Claudio Lavanga and NBC News senior Vatican analyst George Weigel break down the key moments from the ceremony.

entries.title: Prince Harry says William physically attacked him in leaked extract of new book
entries.description: Prince Harry accused his brother Prince William of physically attacking him during an argument over his marriage to Meghan, The Guardian reported Thursday.

entries.title: Pope Francis honors Benedict XVI at funeral Mass
entries.description: Pope Francis had some personal words for his predecessor, Emeritus Pope Benedict XVI, at a funeral Mass held in St. Peter's Square.

entries.title: Pope Francis delivers touching homily at Benedict's funeral
entries.description: Pope Francis said "may your joy be complete" at the end of his homily during the funeral of Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI at St. Peter's Square. NBC News' Claudio Lavanga reports from Rome.

entries.title: Pope Benedict's funeral draws huge crowds to the Vatican
entries.description: Crowds gathered at the Vatican to attend the funeral of Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI, with Pope Francis set to preside over the Mass in St. Peter’s Square.

entries.title: Vietnamese boy trapped in concrete pile on New Year’s Eve is pronounced dead
entries.description: A 10-year-old Vietnamese boy who fell into the narrow open shaft of a concrete pile at a construction site on New Year’s Eve has been confirmed dead.
